oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The development and testing of a vaccine for the prevention of infectious bovine keratoconjunctivitis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: O'Connell, Kevin
George, Lisle
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: protein cytotoxin
Moraxella bovis
concentrated
vaccine trial
efficacy
toxicity
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have purified, concentrated and stabilized the protein cytotoxin from Moraxella bovis. The toxin is concentrated on a filter with a 500,000 kDa molecular weight cut off. Small proteins are removed by extensive diafiltration on the same filter. The cytotoxin is concentrated approximately 500 fold, and remains active after 5 months of freezing. A vaccine trial for toxicity and efficacy were performed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 177
